page.title: 04 SHOPPING HABITS.
page.content: Whitley Lodge Shopping Centre is surrounded by numerous private housing estates and comprises of 2O shops,one bank,a public house,two garages and a car park with 13O spaces. A survey was conducted to examine the SHOPPING HABITS of local people in the 198OÂ£s.The findings were as follows:- Approximately 85OO people used the centre each day,8O% these visiting the two Supermarkets,1O% the Newsagent,6% the Greengrocers and 4% the rest.5O% of those people shopping travelled to the centre by car,46% walked and 4% by bus. 72% shopped there daily,25% weekly and 3% monthly.44% shopped soley at the centre while 56% completed their main shopping elsewhere.The following items were purchased by shoppers each week:- Bread,Butter,Eggs,Bacon,Biscuits,Cheese Apples,Potatoes,Meat,Milk,Cereal,Toilet Rolls,Disinfectant and Soap.
